question: Is the bot down?
answer: If the bot is not responding or providing slow responses, try switching to any of our backup bots which you can find the links for at: https://trojan.app/links. If you've tried every bot and each one is the same, this may be due to Telegram Servers being delegated. Please check-in on our Official Telegram Users Channel to keep updated.
